person.persName: Marcus W. Hardin (Jefferson County, Kentucky, printer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, printer. Kentucky native. Married to Nannie E. Vance Hardin in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on May 26, 1857. Father of Charley Hardin, Lillie Belle Hardin, Carrie B. Hardin, Thomas V. Hardin, and Willie Hardin. Printer in Jefferson County in 1860. Household owned five enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1860. Printer in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1861. Printer in Louisville in 1865.
